::ShadowWing:;

She send a feeling of love to him,"You haven't failed me at all.  We 
have this brief moment to be together again. I thank the Matrix for 
these moments."  She could see him next to her.  She reaches out and 
tried to touch him.  But her hands pasted through him.  They were 
mental images to one another.  She was still glad to see him. "You 
have never failed me.  It is I who failed you my love.  Please don't 
blame yourself.  It was all my fault.  I wanted to prove something.  
And I ended up hurting you instead."  She looked down.  Then she 
looked up at him and smiled.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> OOC Logo we'v got to do something about our timing, I was writing 
the 
> post while you sent yours, great minds do think alike.
> 
> BIC Images of Shadow Wing went through Lunarpines head like a Wild 
> Fire, he could feal her presence, hear her thoughts, even it 
seemed, 
> smell her soft feathers.
> 
> "Wing? what happened to me? You're here, I'm so glad to see you." 
he 
> regained his composure "I mean it's good to see you're still 
> functioning."
> 
> His memory flashed back in time He could see Serpentor kicking her 
> unmoving body, he could feal his own claws slashing himself in 
order 
> to save her, all his memories collected until the moment Veratis 
> crossed him. Lunarpine had sworn to protect Shadow Wings spark and 
> here he was nonfunctional he fealt he'd failed her again.
> 
>
